title: Breaking in Sally
description: Sally ran away from home out west to make her fortune in gold country.And her first week in the Bonanza Saloon is a steep sexual learning curve. She's got one week to make the boss happy, and if she's honest, she's looking forward to round two with him. A sexual awakening in an era where whores were commonplace entertainment and whisky ran freely among prospectors trying to make it rich.A deliciously dirty tale of Sally's first times, and her determination to make a name for herself at the Bonanza Saloon.
author: Dolly Sinclaire
